record.recordid: Array and structure type chg - - en

brief.brief: Use the mass update function in the database manager to migrate the data from the old field to the new field.
You cannot change the type of a field from array or structure to a scalar type and visa-versa.
You must add the new fields to the dbdict record.

detail.detail: For example, to use the mass update command to change a character type field (called old.field) to an array of characters (called new.field) you could use the following command:
1 in new.field in $file=old.field in $file; old.field in $file=NULL
This command moves the value of old.field into the first array element in new.field, and then deletes the value from old.field.
It is not necessary to make the old.field be NULL.
You may prefer to verify that the mass update function completed successfully before NULLing the old.field.
